basics.name: Barat Javadi
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary: Accomplished software engineer specializing in object-oriented approaches to database, network and platform development. Extensive background in full life-cycle of software development process including requirement gathering, design, coding, test, debug and maintenance. Proven track record of designing and implementing flexible solutions which support frequent and functionality changes.

work.summary: Coordinate with product developers, software designers, testing and consultants to ensure completion of project requirements in a timely manner. Developed android programs in android team.
Developed, implemented and maintained android insurance applications that calculate the five insurance types. Ported desktop app to mobile version.

Responsible for delivering projects against agreed scope, schedule & product owner expectations. Doing this whilst supervising, directing & motivating. Sometime design tools and research in security scope.
Responsible for Manage and boost develop team. and product owner expectations. Also develop some financial and warhouse desktop apolication.

volunteer.summary: Persian translate of think python book, chapter 13.

courses: C++ by Example for Beginners Trainer

publications.name: MongoDB Quick Start Guide
publications.summary: A tutorial series of mongodb from scratch in Persian that describes the CRUD, administration and deployment operation.

publications.name: SQL Reference Guide
publications.summary: SQL cookbook that describes about the sql language in common RDBMS with examples. The SQL Server examples attached in book.

publications.name: OOP in C# Programming
publications.summary: Persian translation of C# stpe by step book, chapter 7.

references.name: Mey3am Mohaammdi
references.reference: Barat is so responsible and he can manage a team very good. His enthusiasm in works causes improvement in group and other coworkers.
